divs: Sighting DetailsI was with two friends talking outside after a meeting. I was just talking about having babies, (one of them is pregnant) and the importance of parents becoming aware when they bring children into the world. I remember getting really adamant saying its not about being perfect parents but about the repair and about caring about the next generation with love and compassion. Then I happened to look up. And said "what the heck is that?" It looked like a bullet shooting through the sky but instead of going straight it made wave patterns up and down as it crossed the sky. It must have crossed the entire section I was looking at in about 5 seconds (much too fast for an airplane) and then "puff" it disappeared. The "puff" was important because it almost went out like a match or a light.
